myabout.about: We are an independent group of experienced professionals in fields of business analysis, statistics and software development. Our goal is to combine the experience in applied mathematics, software development with practical experience in valuation and real estate activities.
myabout.miss: Analysis, design, and implementation of modern IT tools for business, especially in areas that, for various reasons, remained insufficiently covered by IT technologies. We conduct a system analysis of market needs and current trends in the IT industry for a synthesis of effective solutions for a wide range of subject areas.
myabout.prj: At now a task of the project is to raise the IT infrastructure of the real estate market of Ukraine to a new level. Our site is an experimental place (laboratory) for the design and implementation of various information services and software modules. Any graphics, diagrams, tables and forms that you can find on this site can be placed on any website in a variety of design solutions. Complex statistical systems, programs, and databases that are the "foundation" of our statistical observations can be adapted and integrated (as specific software modules) into a business workflow of companies professionally working with real estate and in related markets. We are open for communication and will be happy to consider any suggestions of using our products and experience.

inx.h3comerc: Indicators of the commercial real estate market in Kiev
inx.h3resident: Indicators of the residential real estate market in Kiev
inx.nrpricechng: Live charts of price changes in the secondary market of non-residential premises in Kiev
inx.nrpricelvl: Live diagrams of the current price level in the secondary market of non-residential premises in Kiev
inx.rpricechng: Live charts of price changes in the secondary market of apartments in Kiev
inx.rpricelvl: Live diagrams of the current price level in the secondary market of apartments in Kiev

diacomr.name1: Current rental rates for non-residential premises in the secondary market in Kiev (for 1 sq.m per month)
diacomr.name2: Current rates for renting office space in the secondary market in Kiev (for 1 sq.m per month)
diacomr.name3: Current rates for renting commercial premises in the secondary market in Kiev (for 1 sq.m per month)
diacomr.name4: Current rates for renting basements in the secondary market in Kiev (for 1 sq.m per month)
